About Me

I'm a full-stack web developer based in Cape Town. I previously worked in the automotive industry as a machine setter and shift leader for several years. In2019 I started my career in web development and fell in love with seeing my work come to life. If I'm not coding I enjoy traveling and meeting new people.

Education

In 2009 I finished high school and started working as a machine operator at QTec Moulding. I took a few online classes when I started(2019) my web dev career, but didn't get as much out of it as I have hoped for. I'm now(April 2022) enrolled at
